title: Storing Up Mercy For Your Family | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Storing Up Mercy For Your Family | Joel Osteen
description:
Everything we do impacts the legacy we’re going to leave behind. When you choose to live a life of excellence, you're not only setting yourself up for blessings—you're storing up mercy for your future generations.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
